June 25 - 26, 2016
We'll send you a reminder before the conference starts with a link to join.

The Future of Bitcoin

As Bitcoin faces its first evolutionary growing pains and active debate about the future of the network continues, the need for open dialog is becoming more important than ever. The purpose of OnChain Scaling events is to bring focus to solutions and ideas that will help scale the on-chain network capacity and ecosystem. Although many interesting approaches to scaling involve off-chain or second layer networks, on-chain innovations are important as they have a direct effect on growing network adoption in the near-term without introducing new economic variables.

The secondary goal of these conferences is to address and explore the widespread global effect of the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency phenomenon, its potential to change and revolutionize the way people think about economics and money, and how it can be used to empower the underserved.

Join Us

Please consider this an invitation to join us and our esteemed presenters for this online conference, including Gavin Andresen as the Keynote speaker.

Academics or visionaries with proposals regarding scaling the Bitcoin network, please email contact@onchainscaling.com. Please include a copy or link to an abstract of your research paper or your presentation topic.

If you would like to sponsor this event, please contact sponsor@onchainscaling.com



Jerry David
Conference Organizer
